alert.note: Alert for Big Stone; Traverse (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 1:21PM CDT until April 23 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: The National Weather Service in Aberdeen has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Traverse County in west central Minnesota... Northwestern Big Stone County in west central Minnesota... Central Roberts County in northeastern South Dakota... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 121 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Peever, or 8 miles southeast of Sisseton, moving north at 80 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Sisseton, Dakota Connection & Casino and Lake Traverse Housing Units around 125 PM CDT. New Effington and Victor around 135 PM CDT. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for west central Minnesota...and northeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for west central Minnesota...and northeastern South Dakota.
